title: Professor Pixel Progress Schema
description: Defines the structure for tracking user progress, including XP, levels, and achievements.

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user.

xp.description: Total experience points earned by the user.

level.description: The user's current level, derived from their XP.

id.description: A unique identifier for the achievement, e.g., 'PONG_MASTER'.

name.description: The display name of the achievement, e.g., 'Pong Master'.

description.description: A description of how to earn the achievement.

unlocked.description: Whether the user has unlocked this achievement.

unlockedTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the achievement was unlocked.
